divs: Sighting Detailsme, my cousin chris, chris's girlfriend mackenzie, and my cousin david were all headed out to my car to leave for taco bell. in the distance we saw an object headed north toward us and david jokingly said look guys its a ufo. everyone was like please, its probably a plane. as we were leaving the object had begun to lower and was now flying around us in the area. i followed down streets that appeared to bring us closer to it. it had one solid red light, 2 flashing red lights, and a green light that appeared once in a while. down the road we seen a police officer and i realized i had forgot my license at home so i had david drive. we tried to think rationally maybe its a strange plane? but it would switch direction instantly. and hover in place we even saw an actual plane to confirm that it did not look like a plane it also did not make a loud helicopter noise considering how close it was. after kind of scaring ourselves we decided to just head up to taco bell and come back to see if it were still there. sadly it was not. i never believed i have saw a ufo before this. it was kind of frightening.
